title: Batman 664-666 (digital) (OkC.O.M.P.U.T.O.-Novus-HD) [NVS-D]
description:
A Novus Release




This torrent includes the HD versions.
  
 


*Note: You can download all or only choose which version you'd prefer by deselecting the one you don't want when you add the torrent to your client software. If you're adding the torrent via magnet link, you can deselect any undesired file in the list of files once the torrent has begun downloading.

========================================================






#664  "Knightfall" part 12, continued from BATMAN #497. The diabolical man-brute known as Bane has broken the Batman. His back broken and left for dead, Batman is in no shape to stop Bane from taking Gotham for himself. Who will take up the fight? Continued in BATMAN #498.

#665  "Knightfall" part 14, continued from BATMAN #498. The shocking fate of Batman leaves Gotham City coming apart at the seams while Robin and Jean-Paul Valley try to contend with the madness on their own. Continued in BATMAN #499.

#666  "Knightfall" part 16, continued from BATMAN #499. The mantle of the Bat has passed to another, and his first order of business is to find Bane and put him out of commission for good. It's the new Batman vs. Bane, with Gotham City at stake! Continued in BATMAN #500.




Thanks goes to OkC.O.M.P.U.T.O this release.
